titles.title: To Avert from Men God's Wrath

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: Christ bids each afflicted soul, "Come that I may soothe your grief. No one who is strong and whole needs a doctor for relief; therefore have no fear, draw nigh, that your want I may supply."

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: But examine first your case, whether you be in the faith; do you long for pard’ning grace? Is your only hope His death? Then, how e’er your soul’s oppressed, come, you are a worthy guest.

verse.name: v4
